name: Buildings
description: Patterns that give shape to groups of buildings and individual buildings in three dimensions. These patterns define individual buildings and spaces between buildings, under the control of individuals or small groups who can build them all at once.
process: Step-by-step procedure for building patterns into a design. Work on site with actual users, let form grow gradually from pattern fusion, take patterns one by one, maintain fluidity, keep track of area and budget throughout the process.
